document_data.name: Balsa
document_data.mainbody: '''Balsa trees''' were a species of fast-growing trees with light-weight soft wood.
document_data.Usages:
Beyond the world of [[Toril]], Balsa wood was used to build light ''[[spelljammer]]'' ships called ''[[Locust (spelljammer)|Locust]]'', originally developed in [[Wa]] with the aid of [[Cormyr]]ean [[wizard]].

[[Enchanted]] [[quarterstaves]] of [[Myth Drannor]], the ''[[spellstaff|spellstaves]]'', were as sturdy as the hardest [[oak]], but were made out of light balsa wood.
